w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.name: AMA||ResultsAndDiscussion>>Histopathology>>Headnotes>>Html
w:DERRichTextAreaPUT.p: [Discuss the incidence of gross pathology (thyroid gland hypertrophy and atrophy) and histopathology observations. Summarize qualitative (narrative) observations regarding effects on the thyroid gland, including observations of colloid quality (not included in the tables below), if provided. Identify any apparent treatment-related effects. Complete the tables below, specifying values for each severity grade listed.]

g:HTMLPanel.div: Table 13: Gross Pathology and Histopathology of the Thyroid Gland in [test organism].
Abbreviations: 1 Thyroid gland gross pathology and histopathology are graded 0 - 3 based on severity: 0=Not remarkable, 1=Mild, 2=Moderate, 3=Severe. See OECD No. 82 for reference.
